mdRecord.dcterms:title: Strauss' much admired waltzes: as performed in Europe by his celebrated band and in America by the Prague Company, Book 1
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Prague Company (Musical group)
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The Apollo waltz -- Rosa waltz -- The Norma waltz -- The Augusta waltz -- The Caroline waltz -- The Orpheus waltz -- The Sophia waltz -- The Belvidere waltz -- The Juliet waltz -- The Hope waltz.
Originally for orchestra; arr. for piano.
Attribution of all but the 2nd work is doubtful. Cf. Werke f√ºr Pianoforte. Bd. 1-5, Walzer / Johann Strauss.
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Twenty-sixth title in a bound volume of sheet music from the library of Mrs. Abby A. Waterhouse, with her name on the cover.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Waltzes
Piano music, Arranged
